Title: An Act Transferring the Seat of the Provincial Government of Lanao Del Norte from Iligan City to the Municipality of Tubod, Same Province
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 181
An Act Transferring the Seat of the Provincial Government of Lanao Del Norte from Iligan City to the Municipality of Tubod, Same Province
Section 1. The seat of the Provincial Government of Lanao del Norte is hereby transferred from Iligan City to the Municipality of Tubod, same province.1Ã¢wphi1 The expenses incidental to said transfer shall be borne by the Provincial Government of Lanao del Norte.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 5, 1982
